scriptLines:
query: '
SELECT [E2eis_Seq_Number]
      ,[E2eis_Satlite_Seq_Number]
      ,[Carrier_Name]
      ,[Agency_Name]
      ,[Agent_Name]
      ,[Agent_ID]
      ,[Agent_Number]
      ,[Agent_Commission_Note]
      ,[Effective_Date]
      ,[Client_Name]
      ,[Policy_ID]
      ,[Policy_Number]
      ,[Stmt_Coverage_Type]
      ,[Bill_From_Date]
      ,[Month_of_Bill_From_Date]
      ,[Lives]
      ,[Premium_Amount]
      ,[Commission_Amount]
      ,[Commission_Entry_Note]
      ,[Revenue_Type]
      ,[Balance_Forwarded]
      ,[Agency_Code]
      ,[Broker_Start_Date]
      ,[Broker_End_Date]
      ,[Product_Type]
      ,[Product_Description]
      ,[IMS_Transaction_ID]
      ,[Policy_Status]
      ,[Member_Count]
      ,[On/Off_Exchange]
      ,[BOB_Coverage_Type]
      ,[Coverage_Start__Date]
      ,[Coverage_End_Date]
      ,[Paid_Through_Date]
      ,[Subscriber_First_Name]
      ,[Subscriber_Middle_Name]
      ,[Subscriber_Last_Name]
      ,[Subscriber_Full_Name]
      ,[State]
      ,[City]
      ,[County]
      ,[Ims_Agent_Id]
      ,[Runner_Full_Name]
      ,[Runner_Role]
      ,[Override_Employee_Id]
      ,[Override_Payee_Name]
      ,[Override_Payee_Role]
      ,[Department_Employee_Id]
      ,[Department_Full_Name]
      ,[Department_Role]
      ,[Payment_Rate]
      ,[Rate]
      ,[Rate_Type]
      ,[Depart_Rate]
      ,[Depart_Rate_Type]
      ,[Agent_Commission]
      ,[Department_Commission]
      ,[COMPENSATION_TYPE]
      ,[REMOVECOMMISSION]
      ,[Agent_Statement_Date]
      ,[Comments]
      ,[Agency_ID]
      ,[Record_Load_Date]
      ,[Record_Loaded_By]
      ,[Record_Data_Source]
      ,[Record_Flag_Status]
  FROM [dbo].[AIA_COMMISSION_PAYMENT_HISTORY] WHERE Record_Load_Date IN(SELECT MAX(Record_Load_Date) FROM [dbo].[AIA_COMMISSION_PAYMENT_HISTORY])


',

query: 'SELECT 
  carrier, Policy_Status, count(*) Total_Records
      FROM [dbo].[AIA_BOB_ALL_AGENCY_ALL_POLICY_ALL_TRANSACTION_ID_HISTORY]
  where  [Record_Load_Date] IN( select max([Record_Load_Date]) FROM 
 [dbo].[AIA_BOB_ALL_AGENCY_ALL_POLICY_ALL_TRANSACTION_ID_HISTORY]) group by carrier,Policy_Status
  order by carrier desc ;',

query: ' SELECT carrier as Agency_Name, Policy_Status, count(*) Total_Records\n      FROM [dbo].[AIA_BOB_ALL_AGENCY_ALL_POLICY_ALL_TRANSACTION_ID_HISTORY]\n  group by carrier,Policy_Status ORDER BY carrier',

query: 'SELECT 
  carrier, Policy_Status, count(*) Total_Records
      FROM [dbo].[AIA_BOB_ALL_AGENCY_ALL_POLICY_ALL_TRANSACTION_ID_HISTORY]
  where  [Record_Load_Date] IN( select max([Record_Load_Date]) FROM 
 [dbo].[AIA_BOB_ALL_AGENCY_ALL_POLICY_ALL_TRANSACTION_ID_HISTORY]) group by carrier,Policy_Status
  order by carrier desc ;',

query: 'SELECT *
 FROM [dbo].[ABI_COMMISSION_ALL_SALES_REPORT_HISTORY]
 WHERE [Record_Load_Date] IN (SELECT max([Record_Load_Date]) 
 FROM [dbo].[ABI_COMMISSION_ALL_SALES_REPORT_HISTORY])',

query: '   SELECT *
 FROM [dbo].[ABI_COMMISSION_ALL_SALES_SUMMARY_HISTORY]
 WHERE [Record_Load_Date] IN (SELECT max([Record_Load_Date]) 
 FROM [dbo].[ABI_COMMISSION_ALL_SALES_SUMMARY_HISTORY])',

query: 'SELECT  
        [E2eis_Seq_Number],  
        ISNULL([Carrier], '') [Carrier],   
        ISNULL([Broker_Start_Date], '') [Broker_Start_Date],  
        ISNULL([Broker_End_Date], '') [Broker_End_Date],  
        ISNULL([IMS_Transaction_ID], '') [IMS_Transaction_ID],  
        ISNULL([Policy_Status], '') [Policy_Status],  
        ISNULL([Policy_ID], '') [Policy_ID],  
        ISNULL([Member_Count], '') [Member_Count],  
        ISNULL([Subscriber_Original_Effective_Date], '') [Subscriber_Original_Effective_Date],  
        ISNULL([Coverage_Start__Date], '') [Coverage_Start__Date],  
        ISNULL([Coverage_End_Date], '') [Coverage_End_Date],   
        ISNULL([State], '') [State],  
        ISNULL([County], '') [County],  
        ISNULL([Group_Team_Sales], '') [Group_Team_Sales] 
    FROM [dbo].[AIA_BOB_ALL_AGENCY_ALL_POLICY_ALL_TRANSACTION_ID_HISTORY]
    WHERE [Group_Team_Sales] LIKE 'Credico%'',

query: 'SELECT *
 FROM [SIM_103].[SIM_BOB_ALL_AGENCY_ALL_POLICY_ALL_TRANSACTION_ID_HISTORY]
 WHERE [Record_Load_Date] IN (SELECT max([Record_Load_Date]) 
   FROM [SIM_103].SIM_BOB_ALL_AGENCY_ALL_POLICY_ALL_TRANSACTION_ID_HISTORY
)',

query: 'SELECT  
        [E2eis_Seq_Number],  
        ISNULL([Carrier], '') [Carrier],   
        ISNULL([Broker_Start_Date], '') [Broker_Start_Date],  
        ISNULL([Broker_End_Date], '') [Broker_End_Date],  
        ISNULL([IMS_Transaction_ID], '') [IMS_Transaction_ID],  
        ISNULL([Policy_Status], '') [Policy_Status],  
        ISNULL([Policy_ID], '') [Policy_ID],  
        ISNULL([Member_Count], '') [Member_Count],  
        ISNULL([Subscriber_Original_Effective_Date], '') [Subscriber_Original_Effective_Date],  
        ISNULL([Coverage_Start__Date], '') [Coverage_Start__Date],  
        ISNULL([Coverage_End_Date], '') [Coverage_End_Date],   
        ISNULL([State], '') [State],  
        ISNULL([County], '') [County],  
        ISNULL([Group_Team_Sales], '') [Group_Team_Sales] 
    FROM [AIA_102].[AIA_BOB_ALL_AGENCY_ALL_POLICY_ALL_TRANSACTION_ID_HISTORY]
    WHERE [Group_Team_Sales] LIKE 'Credico%'',
